content: This is an embarrassingly old person online question but - do people still blog? I miss longer-form writing. I like letterboxd but I don‚Äôt always want to write about movies. Where does it happen? Tumblr? Wordpress? I feel like this is a dead art

content.html: This makes me so sad, because blogs and owning your own website are such critical, fundamental parts of the internet. You can put *anything you want* on your own website, when you run it yourself. And I feel a whole generation is used to thinking of the internet as borrowed.
content.value:
This makes me so sad, because blogs and owning your own website are such critical, fundamental parts of the internet.

You can put *anything you want* on your own website, when you run it yourself. And I feel a whole generation is used to thinking of the internet as borrowed.
